Name: Time Lock VR-episode Lumber Room
About the game: Time Lock VR Episode 'Living Room' The player will have to solve puzzles to remove the sorcerer's curse. To solve puzzles you will need to travel in time. GAMEPLAY FEATURES. Solve puzzles to get out of the room. You can interact with items, and also transfer them in time. The room can be explored at different times. Explore every corner on your way. Brew a potion to remove the curse. -Good soundtrack -Various puzzles -Experiments with time
